short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace your new tab page into productive tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your New Tab page into a dark background that display a Time, Date and greets you. this is a simple new tab page which is in  black dark background that gives your eyes an ease.
features: 

- This new tab page will greet you every day with a message that says good morning, good afternoon, or good evening. 
- The Black dark background will give your eyes comfort.
